website_summaries.verdict: This boot is a fine product if the colors and pattern attract you.
pros: Customers love the design and fun variety of colors
Boots work well in warm weather, too
cons: A bit snug in the foot

customer_reviews.title: Order one size down for a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much! When I saw the forecast calling for nothing but rain for the next 10 days, I knew I had to get something to help me feel happy about it. These adorable boots did the trick! I ordered my regular shoe size 8 and found them to be too big, so I returned them and went one size down and they fit perfectly! They shipped very quickly and in the cutest box that you can color to help you relax even more if it’s planning to rain forever where you live!
customer_reviews.author: Tania R. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very cute, but they are very poor quality. I bought them and didn't have a chance to use them until months later. The first time I used them, my left foot got wet. Water came in trough one of the sides. I contacted Amazon and because I was returning them outside the window of the returning policy, I was refunded only 80% of the total. This should not be the case, since it was a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Balam

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger calf size, quality so so.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed about the boot when I pulled it out of the box was the big scratch across the toe of the boot. The pattern was cute, but I don't know how someone could have missed a flaw so large. My second issue with the boot is the insole. You can not pull your foot out without bringing the insole with it. More annoying than anything. On a positive note...... if you have a larger calf (mine measured 17.5 in this boot WILL fit with room to give.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeyes3

customer_reviews.title: Great price great boot
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and ordered a size down from my usual (I'm 8.5 so I went with the 8) and they fit great, not too big but room for socks if needed. The only reason I rated them 4 stars is that when they get really wet, the smell of rubber is a bit strong. I'm sure it will dissipate in time as I've only worn them a few time. Colors are great and so was the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 15 months, I need new rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of these boots immediately. They were always a little narrow but with a thin sock they were fine. However, at 12 months the started to give me a blister on my heel, EVERY time I wore them. Then they cracked! The plastic not only peeled away at the seem where the base meets the upper boot but the rubber actually continued in a hairline tear in to the main section of the boot. I'm really disappointed that I'm having to buy new rain boots after only 15 months!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tindle

customer_reviews.title: Big Feet & Calves? This Rain Boot is for You!
customer_reviews.text: "The Sak Womens Rhythm Rain Boot" *** Color: Black Rainbow Spirit Desert*** Love these rain boots! I'm a wide size 9 with a high arch & muscular calves these boots fit perfect with a gel insert & a separate arch support. The buckle & elastic gives enough room around the top for think long johns & jeans. Some of the reviews say the boots cracked after wearing the 1st or 2nd time- can definitely see this being a problem if step on the heels to remove them. Also, these boots are all rubber & will crack over time if left out in direct sun or in extreme heat. Definitely a great deal for these cute rain boots!
customer_reviews.author: MiMikk

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They fit better than most rain boots which are usually lose and kind of floppy. I just needed a pair of the rain boot sock liners and I'm set. They are too cute and the trim on them matches one of my Sakroots bags. How neat! Great quality construction and I ordered a half size down as recommended and am happy that I did. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WIDE BOOT AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty narrow in the toe & definitely do not have a wide calf, so be careful if you order them. Also I ordered a size 9 (which is my normal shoe size) and I had a lot of extra room in the heel. They were just awkward for me all the way around. I think if you had a narrow foot & a slim calf they would work great, you might even be able to get away with ordering a size smaller than you normally wear if you don't intend to wear thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: I loved these boots
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots! They were comfortable and worked very well for this year's heavy California rain (with flooding) and for very muddy gardening. I wore them an average of 1-2 times a week for about 3 months (sometimes not at all for a week or two at a time - depending on weather). I had them for about 3 months when I noticed that they started tearing on one of the boots, along the top near the edge of my foot at the base of my big toe. I expected them to last longer. I'm very disappointed at needing to buy another pair of boots before the winter is over.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Rain boots, not garden boots....
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6.5 and ordered a 7 cause I have wide feet. The fit is good. I was needing a garden boot and thought these would work. Nope. The buckle on the back digs into the back of my legs while I kneeling in the garden. My fault, these are rain boots, not garden boots. I fell in love with the looks of them not thinking about functionality. They are super cute rain boots!
customer_reviews.author: dora

customer_reviews.title: Fun Sturdy Women's Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of these boots for some time. I read the reviews and purchased a size 7. I wear between 6.5 to 7. They fit with enough room for thicker socks if need-be - both at the foot and at the calf. There's a clasp at the top to adjust to the size of your calf (and my legs are NOT skinny). They appear to be well made and sturdy. I live in an area with a lot of snow and slush so these will be perfect. Plus I really like the design. The sole has a good tread for walking in snow.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pattern on the boots. Not too bold but still very pretty. They are very tall though. I was expecting mid calf boots and these went all the way to my knee. Also there was a defect - there is a slit in the top of the boot that allows the boot to expand if you need to adjust the buckle based on calf size. The right boot was fine but the left the slit was sealed closed. Wasn’t a huge issue since I didn’t need the expansion, but am annoyed the two boots don’t match.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Candace

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots. I ordered 1 size smaller than I usually take, and they are a smidge roomy, but with socks, they fit perfect. I haven't had the opportunity to use them yet, but they feel comfortable around the house. I mainly bought them because the sole looked like it would be supportive and not slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Like these rain boots. Love the print and the style in general. The only issue is the lack of support. I had to add some supportive insoles for them to fit and feel right, other wise they would have been to big. I ordered an 8 and normally wear a 9, still on the large side, but they work nicely. No wet feet so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern.
customer_reviews.text: The cutest rain boots. Love the colors. Fit slightly loose. I wear a size 7 and bought size 7 but a 6.5 could have worked or even a 6. Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: really wanted them to work
customer_reviews.text: the boots were beautiful, lightweight and actually fit well in the calf area (roomy) I ordered the 8, as I usually do with my outdoor boots, but my foot is very wide and these were too narrow and squeezed the upper part of my foot. The size 8 was the perfect length, but I usually order w to ww shoes and boots. They are really cute but I just needed more side room -- wish they had fit completely.
customer_reviews.author: ol

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but pretty
customer_reviews.text: My Partner's gift review: wished there was a choice for Wide fit. Fits great in length but a little narrow causing my left foot to hurt. A larger size would cause them to be too long for fit. So hoping I am able to stretch them. I love the adjustment straps for calves. If you have a large calves I could see using a ice pick or similar tool to create that extra hole if need that little extra space and still be pretty; the last button was good for me. They are very pretty boots and looks to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: senaida Luera

customer_reviews.title: too tight
customer_reviews.text: Boot is too tight. I have another pair, same brand, same style, same size that I bought locally (DSW) and they fit great. This pair seems to be 1/2 to 1 size tighter around the entire foot. Won't buy these online again.
customer_reviews.author: TLee

customer_reviews.title: High and Dry
customer_reviews.text: I am in Louisiana and I am so glad I bought these boots. They fit well, are good and thick and they are tall so I can go pretty deep if needed. I do not know how they would be in snow or cold. They look cute too.
customer_reviews.author: triedit

customer_reviews.title: The boots did not quite fit me right and I was very disappointed that I had to pay to ship them back
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI - this company does NOT provide free returns. The boots did not quite fit me right and I was very disappointed that I had to pay to ship them back. It didn't deter as I still didn't want them - the colors were not quite what they appeared to be online. They weren't as vivid and were kind of off. Just don't make the mistake I made - only order if you are sure you will keep them - otherwise order these from ZAPPOS or something!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bleicher

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these rain boots for a little over a year now, and they are falling apart. The plastic/rubber is ripped open where the sole meets the boot. The sole punctured very easily, and essentially has made the rain boots totally ineffective. I would not suggest buying these boots if you plan on wearing them often and you want your feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: They leak!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of these boots - they're pretty and they fit my legs well. However, the first pair cracked within a year, right at the ankle, and the second pair let water in the first time I wore it! I wish the quality matched the appearance, but in the end, I buy rain boots to keep my feet dry on muddy wet hikes, and these boots sadly don't meet that requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Lavinia T.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my shoe size and they will work perfectly with some nice warm socks. Going to Ireland and I hear it's rainy there. Having lived in Arizona for the past 55 years, I 've never owned nor needed a pair of rain boots so was very happy to find so many colors and patterns to chose from. I am very happy with my selection. Bring on the rain :)
customer_reviews.author: arizonagramma

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy fit
customer_reviews.text: Boots is true sized. Arrived in very attractive box perfect for gift giving. Sadly product was not they gave a very Sloppy fit. Bunch up at mid calf. Boots arrived damaged they were cut/split at cuff not for wide calves. Otherwise very attractive very fashionable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Live Fan

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots however they run about a half size large!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: SAKS BOOTS ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought SAKS rain Boots for working in the yard. The problem with this style is that they really have a strong rubber smell when left right inside the back door, which tends to permeate the entire house. I will always buy the lined ones from now on.
customer_reviews.author: WasAllMine

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flawed
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear for a music festival that expected rain. They were cute but I took stars off for the paint job. There were two spots on my boots that were missing the pattern like a bad rubber print. I got too close to the event so I did not have enough time to return for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice, well made boot for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad they don't come in 1/2 sizes, so I had to go up a size. They are a litte big but that was expected. I think they will be perfect for NJ spring showers and they are comfortable. I don't need it, but the shaft is wide for those who are concerned about that. They seem to be sturdy and stylish at the same time. I LOVE the reusable box wth a little handle that they came in! This is a good boot for the price!
customer_reviews.author: M.Not.

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, fit, and dryness of these boots. I wore them for short periods to walk to the bus stop on dew wet grass through the school year, and longer periods on rainy days. After 8 months they tore and have to be thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: mommyOF3

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. The colors are just as vibrant as the photos. They are slightly big but nothing that a good pit of socks won't fix! They are beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Roberson

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months the boot split at the seam. ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the boot split at the seam. Too late for a return or replacement. Don’t buy this if you plan on really wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Im updating my review. I work in a dog grooming salon and I wear boots everyday. These lasted about 2 months before they split along the seam at the toe. And then from there just desenigrated. It looks like edward scissorhands tried to juggle them. For $60 I was hoping they would last a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide calves
customer_reviews.text: I just got my boots. I love the color and the quality. I usually wear a 7.5, so I ordered an 8 thinking I'd be fine. The foot is quite roomy, enough to wear thick socks and still be comfortable, however they do not fit my calves at all. Even after I adjusted the buckle on the side, they were still uncomfortably tight. Basically, if your​ calves are not toothpicks, these are not for you. I'm extremely disappointed because I love everything else about these boots (hence the 2stars), but I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I love the pattern and boots themselves
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and boots themselves, however after only one wearing outside the buckle on one of the boots snapped off.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Thought they would last longer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes 3 years ago but only wore them around 20 times and only times and only to walk our dog. One now has a tear in the front at the seam so they are no longer waterproof. Thought they would last longer
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Great boots to keep your feet dry
customer_reviews.text: I just need to wear a heavy pair of socks with thwae, but I love thwm. Have received many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon StolteNo HeadlineNo Headline

customer_reviews.title: Check your box!
customer_reviews.text: Please check your box! I ordered and liked the boots very much. I tried on the right boot and fit was perfect. I was going to just throw them into the closet until I needed them, but just so happened to get the other one out to try on last minute. It was an 8, where as the ordered size was a 9. Total fail by quality control!! I had two completely different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: RisingGold

customer_reviews.title: ... these for my girlfriend back in February and she loved the fit and design
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my girlfriend back in February and she loved the fit and design. However, the back seam on the boots just split this week. She only wore them during normal use. The quality of these boots are very very poor. Do not buy these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife to replace some older ones. She loves them. They fit as expected and look great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Shop around, you may find them on sale.  Love the pattern.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Rhythm rain boot pattern. These boots will definitely keep my feet dry in wet weather. I wear a size 8 and ordered that size. If you were going to wear heavy socks, you may want to order next size up to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots! I wear a 7
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! I wear a 7.5 so ordered an 8 then had to return them for a 7 because they are generously sized.
customer_reviews.author: J A...Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful, cheery rainboots with a soft, cushioned footbed. They fit me comfortably with thin or thick socks. The soles have good traction for slippery, wet surfaces. They also passed the waterproof test: my feet were dry after walking through a stream.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Colors vary be sure to double check the style before you order
customer_reviews.text: My wife requested these for Christmas. She wears them whenever the weather turns cold and rainy and in the Pacific Northwest that happens frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma Web

customer_reviews.title: I order one whole size SMALLER and it fits perfect. It's free returns which made the initial exchange ...
customer_reviews.text: I order one whole size SMALLER and it fits perfect. It's free returns which made the initial exchange easy.
customer_reviews.author: yd

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern CA so I don’t need rain boots too often, but when I do, I really do! I work outside so these are a great when it’s pouring and I need to work all day. They’re comfy right away, no breaking in. Warmer and less stiff than most ones I’ve tried. They're cute, effective, and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Baker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Compliments! Held up to walking on beach in water!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. Lots of compliments. I wore these on a camping trip and walked through heavy sand to get down to beach. They didn't seem too heavy. I've worn them an hour at the longest at this point. Looking forward to rainy weather at home to wear again.
customer_reviews.author: AJAB

customer_reviews.title: They're really very beautiful and my feet stay totally dry
customer_reviews.text: I use these whenever we get a lot of rain. They're a little large and clunky but I'm afraid the next size down would have been too small. They get lots and lots of compliments. They're really very beautiful and my feet stay totally dry.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the rain and mud
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and wish I had orderd a couple more styles. I haven't worn them outside yet since I just received them but I know they will do the job. I can tell they will be easy to clean for my muddy walks and doing yard work. I do have to wear socks and long pants as they are a bit loose in the calf area but I normal shaped but slender calves. They fit to the toe perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my eighty year old Mom and she was very happy with her new rain boots. The fit, quality, and color were perfect. She appreciates the grip of the soles on slippery surfaces. She has had a similar pair for many years through rain, snow, and slush and has worn them out. This new pair should last her into her nineties and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Rocketmom

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair of SAK boots. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of SAK boots. I volunteer at an aquarium and wear them a full day (a full day that I'm tough on them) each week. My last pair lasted me 3 years before they were finally no longer waterproof. These are well worth the money and they have tons of cute designs! Durable, waterproof and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Nos

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My second pair, I liked my first so much I bought another color.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking a few months in
customer_reviews.text: These are cute boots, but the quality leaves something to be desired. They started leaking only a few months after I got them. At this price I would have hoped they would last longer than much cheaper boots.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Larina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wellies
customer_reviews.text: They do the trick. It rained right after I got them. I had no problem using them with my thick hiking socks. I have a narrow heel so most pull on boots are a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: tismeinaz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I just wore an extra pair of footy socks with them and they fit fine. I wear an 8.5 shoe so I got a 9 boot as 8 would have been too small. I wore these 4 wheeling for 5 hours and my feet and legs were dry and warm the entire day, and the mud washed right off. They are cute enough to wear to work on a rainy day without changing into other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Walls Wallpapering &Painting  LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and true to size
customer_reviews.text: My legs are on the skinny side so I had no problems with my calls. They are very cute and so far have held up working in the garden, mud, and yard. The fit is true to size. I wear 7.5 regularly and the same size fit just right on these.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting and looking for
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. One thing I would say is they run very slightly large, but okay as I can wear thick socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mccarroll

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: The boots were cute, I liked the design. My problem was that the ankle/foot was too big and the calf was too small, making the fit very awkward for me. I have a size 10 foot and my calf circumference is 18 inches. It was just too tight on my calf, but plenty big in the foot and ankle. They were nice quality, brand new and had no other problems. Would have kept if my foot/calf would have fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Inga J.

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised they fit perfect. I bought these for camping and lucky me ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. I was surprised they fit perfect. I bought these for camping and lucky me it didn't rain. However, I'm sure I will be putting them to good use during hurricane Florence.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzin2015

customer_reviews.title: These get the job done at a relatively low  price!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone comments how cute they are! They slip on easily for running out to the barn, and easily come off when I come back. They fit very well and are very comfortable. Great price too! Con-they won't last forever and I will miss them when they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Maven

customer_reviews.title: Thank You, Great Rain Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these boots and they are absolutely perfect! True size 11....finding a great fit right from the box always an issue with big feet! They are slightly loose, as all boots should be to accommodate warmer socks, and feel wonderful. I've lready been out in the mud and slush (necessary evil on my property) and they fit like a glove. Super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: greerski

customer_reviews.title: Good/Bad
customer_reviews.text: They're cute, the price is right but they run big...really big. Go down a size and expect them to stick out enough around your calves to let rain in.
customer_reviews.author: KristyB.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots!
customer_reviews.text: I found that ordering a size down was the perfect way to go. Wore them for the first time for 3 days straight in rain and mud. Boots held up great and were super comfortable. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: BootsyNotCollins

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Pretty comfortable although they were a little big. It stopped raining midday and the sun came out and the boots got quite hot so be sure to take a back up pair of shoes just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle newbie

customer_reviews.title: You will love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everyday when I’m walking the dog on my property. They run true to size and they’ve held up really well for several years, considering I’m trampling in tall grass and occasionally in the edge of our wooded property. Highly recommended! Plus they’re cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the design
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design! I got so many compliments on them. However, they did not last long. The back seam (by the heel) split after a couple uses. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots!! The graphic is very cute (I ordered the Peace pattern), I was afraid they'd be to young for me, but they're perfect Ann's I receive many compliments on them. They fit pretty true to size, I wear a US 7 1/2 to 8, and I ordered an 8 and they fit perfect, so I wouldn't suggest ordering a size down. Also, my calves are li'l on the thick side (I'm a size 12) and these boots fit great. I would have given another star, but would have liked a little more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the only patterned rain boot I have purchased that has not broken at the instep and ankle where it bends when one walks. I have 3 other pairs of rain boots, and all of them have broken within a short time. I will definitely buy more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: DHSwift

customer_reviews.title: Gives my work day a little extra color which I love. They have done me very well for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I work in them all day and everyday in a wet environment at work. Gives my work day a little extra color which I love. They have done me very well for the last few months. They did get a little hole along the seam where the shoe bends for your toes. I would expect this for how often I am working in them. Just fixed them up with some extra strength water proof adhesive (bondo engine filler/sealant).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I look forward to rainy days just so I can wear them. I would say i have average sized calves and these fit with a little room to spare. I can wear these boots all day long because they are so comfortable. Great purchase and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JennBee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and easy to wear and walk in.
customer_reviews.text: Love these so far, very comfy and I let them out a little on the buckle so they're not clinging to my calves. I love these especially now that here a little looser.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews saying they run large I wear an 8.5 ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly my only complaint is that they were damaged when I got them almost like they had been worn and returned will def order other colors I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Sfillmore

customer_reviews.title: Cute rain boots
customer_reviews.text: I live in CA so these arent really being put to the test. However, I love the pattern, they go well with blue or black or whatever color jeans. I did stand in a couple puddles to see if they kept the water out and they did, but mind you these were 1 1/2 in puddles not 3in puddles!
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: They are more comfortable than I expected them to be. I expected them to be a little awkward and heavy since I have never really worn rain boots before these, they were neither. I was able to wear them all day walking and touring the countryside of Ireland. I never even broke them in or wore them before that day, they were so comfortable.They are also just as beautiful and colorful in person. They are not warm at all though, so you'll definitely need an insert if you're looking for a warmer boot.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne MM

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8. I ordered an 8. I love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pattern
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern on this. Why have a plain rain boot when you can get something jazzy. I know I'm only out in my yard and flowerbeds, but it sure is a fun colorful boot. Fits good. Nice thick sole - you don't feel rocks under your feet when walking around.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome, cute, and fit perfectly. Many compliments. I was a little worried about the calf fitting (because mine are LARGE), but it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Love the design of this boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this boots. But size feels like half inch bigger. Need to wear socks to make the fit perfect. Unfortunately I wore this only 4 months So sad the right pair got broke right away.
customer_reviews.author: Picky

customer_reviews.title: Rain boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots were sent to me defective, I think the QC should have been better. Not just grab the item and send. I bought these boots years ago and loved them, The quality of these boot are excellent but the rubber on the ones I order was not correctly put on the boots. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: william bucci

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my new boots. I use them on rainy day walks with my dog as well as gardening after alot of rain. Comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kecia N. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and comfortable too!
customer_reviews.text: Love these...they are very good quality and very comfortable. No seams that I could see that could leak. Adjustable band at top to allow for a large calf but they are plenty big. They hit my legs about 3 inches below knee. I am 5'3". So pretty! Cannot wait for rain!
customer_reviews.author: TampaPro

customer_reviews.title: They leak fast!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for less than a month and they already leak. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The boots were super cute but cracked with very little wear around the ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots were super cute but cracked with very little wear around the back and sole. Very disappointed in the wear of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great boot if u have normal calves.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great except I have big calves. Maybe they need broke in, but if u have large calves it could be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jesusa

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the rain!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 in shoes but a 7 or 7.5 in rainboots. I ordered the 7 and they fit perfectly! It does not come all the way up to the knee. It seems higher than the calf. I have a relatively slender calf and could easily tuck jeans into this boot. I love the black with a splash of color and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Drhoniebee

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the material. It is sturdy and thick but not heavy. Love the color combo.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 shoe and of course, these were big, but not so big that they are falling off. Great boots! Wide fit for those who have bunions, like I do. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: If I have to wear rubber on my feet, at least I can make sure they're pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I got so excited when it started to rain I easily slid on my new, beautiful boots and jumped in puddles. And my feet staped super dry!
customer_reviews.author: Malak

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! They arrived so fast. Just in time for rainy weather. They're really comfortable and fit to size. I ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly! So stylish. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and saved my a trip to the store and 15$! They are not insulated.
customer_reviews.author: TBeck

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots!.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome vibrantly colored boots. They feel comfortable... I purchased them for ocean shore fishing. I hope to use them in the next week and feel these boots will work good when temperatures are 50's and above.
customer_reviews.author: iluvqps

customer_reviews.title: I want these in EVERY COLOR!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS!!! They are super comfortable and so stylish. I am very happy that I chose these boots.
customer_reviews.author: J Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great, my second pair. They are colorful and rugged for outdoor events or to work in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots and Stylish TOO!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in time for Hurricane Irma. Best thing I bought pre-storm! I could wade the flood waters with peace of mind that feet were safe/dry. I ordered a size larger than I usually wear to afford thick socks up north in the winter snow. It made putting them on/off a breeze as we were in and out a lot checking storm damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are large and do not run true to size
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered a 6 because her normal shoe size is 7 and rain boots usually run big. However, she was stepping out of these because they were too big. There is no smaller size than a 6. Also, our seller, Outdoor Equipped, charged us $10 to return the item. Annoying...
customer_reviews.author: Jonn D. Abshire

customer_reviews.title: Boots were everything I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Boots. They fit extremely well, are very comfortable, and have been a lot of fun to wear. I highly recommend this brand of boot.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D  Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Sak boot missing logo piece on the back of the boot
customer_reviews.text: Would you believe either the boot did not come with the logo on the back of one of the boots or it fell off. I only wore them twice!!! Neither Amazon or Sak were able to replace them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on
customer_reviews.text: The boots only lasted a few months before cracking and leaving a huge whole leaving them unusable. Don't waste your money on these
customer_reviews.author: Holly Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and design of this boot
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and design of this boot. Going by straight foot size, the fit was perfect. I have large calves and even on the widest setting, the leg was too tight so I am disappointed that I have to return these boots.
customer_reviews.author: PA Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: These are durable but buy a smaller size if you don’t want to wear inserts. Cute pattern.
customer_reviews.author: T. Monsour

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice to start
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice to start. Already has a hole near the seam. Bought for my wife as a gift for Christmas. It's just now May and she cannot wear them when it's wet. Pretty much defeats the purpose of a rain boot.
customer_reviews.author: RojoRover

product_meta.title: The SAK Women's Rhythm Rain Boot
product_meta.description: Brighten up a rainy day with our printed rubber rain boot from sakroots! These boots are lined with jersey and have cushioned insoles for walking city streets.
